ul.li: Include codes from http://loinc.org where CLASSTYPE = 2

description.value: Non laboratory LOINC concepts such as codes for observations like vital signs, hemodynamics, intake/output, EKG, obstetric ultrasound, cardiac echo and other clinical observations. The codes selected should represent discrete and narrative diagnostic observations and reports
